root.name: Who Wants to Beat Up a Millionaire
root.description: In "Who Wants to Beat up a Millionaire" you play as a contestant on a game show. Answer questions correctly to fight a selection of different millionaires in game. A more or less straight take on Who Wants to be a Millionaire, with a questionable fighting element added.

similar_games.game: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire
